title.en: Tensei Akuyaku Reijou desuga, Kyoushi ni Natte Ochikobore Seitotachi ni Mahou de Oshioki shichaimasu!

altTitles.ja: 転生悪役令嬢ですが、教師になって落ちこぼれ生徒たちに魔法でお仕置きしちゃいます！

altTitles.en: I've Reincarnated as a Villainess, However I Became a Teacher who Magically Punishes My Students who have Fallen Behind!

description.en:
If you’re tricked by a guy and get reincarnated, would like to become a villainess? I didn’t know that I have to teach at a magic academy full of problem children and I even have a son?! Rokuka Shinozaki, a teacher chasing after her stealing boyfriend "I will definitely catch him and get my stuff back!" was pushed off a bridge and died… She was then reincarnated as the villainess Rika Versin.

I have never heard of a woman like her. Not only proficient in literary arts, but also martial arts. A beauty who's the best at punishment magic, a villainess lady who toyed with men only to have them- and the brilliant son who was birthed because of a mistake. In addition, the magic academy, after hearing about Rika's punishment magic, asked her to be a teacher in a class full of problem children.

The lethargic prince, the evil son of a genius warrior, the reclusive knight of duke's son, the apprentice of royal doctor who loves women, and the youngest prince who is a sweet little devil... How will Rika "punish" these problem children with such habits?!
description.ja:
ヒモ彼に騙されて転生したら悪役令嬢!?　問題児だらけの魔法学院で教師をやらされて、しかも息子まで居るなんて聞いてないんですけど!?

彼氏に全財産を盗まれたあげく逃亡されてしまった教師の篠崎六花。「絶対にとっ捕まえて、預金通帳を取り返す！」彼氏を追い詰めたものの、逆に橋の上から突き落とされ、死亡……したはずが悪役令嬢リッカ・ヴェルツキンに転生していた！文武両道、お仕置き魔法に関しては右に出る者はいない最強美女、男たちを弄ぶだけ弄んで、ポイ捨てしてきた悪役令嬢――しかも、一夜の過ちでできたという秀才息子もいるなんて、聞いてない！さらに、リッカのお仕置き魔法を聞きつけた魔法学院から『問題児クラスの教師をしてほしい』とお願いされて……。

無気力王子、天才軍師の不良息子、引きこもり騎士公爵、女好きの王宮医師見習い、甘ったれ小悪魔の末っ子王子……クセがすごい問題児たちに、リッカはどう“お仕置き”しちゃうのか!?
